adventure-on-lifebooox.description:
LifebOOOx is a gaming platform built on GoL, which creates a virtual computer inside a virtual life. And OOO brings you one of its most difficult games yet, Adventure. Can you get all the keys and escape the castle? 

`adventure-on-lifebooox.challenges.ooo 37451`

fountain-ooo-reliving.description:
We have found the fountain OOO RElive.  By discovering its secrets, you will restart the game of life with a chance to do it all over again. This challenge is in memory of John Conway (26 December 1937 – 11 April 2020).

pooot.description: The web is becoming more and more dangerous everyday. Our secure pooot proxy allows you to continue your browsing securely and hide your IP address from your visited websites! Give it a swing here: pooot.challenges.ooo

welcome-to-dc2020-quals.description:
Welcome to the 2020 DEF CON CTF quals! Let's start it out with an (almost-)free flag in the file below :)

Files:
 * [welcome.txt](https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/oooverflow-challs/8a40c3a2ec3ef13216c5b3fd45b6631f1ad5b42497eda1ba618518f80f46712d/welcome.txt) 2d29b87082872757c3fe771ff262c96f522d3d6a7c7cff24c59b8170203fda3e

welcome-video.description: Welcome! Flag format for this challenge is stricter than default: `'OOO{' + '_'.join(video_hints) + '}'`, regex `^OOO{[a-z0-9_]*}$`. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W04Wt55v3nE

whooo-are-u.description:
FIRST GOLF CHALLENGE!!!

Who are you, really? Are you the person, the keyboard, the internet connection, or the software? Today, those of us that have faced the glory of pwn.college explore the metaphysical implications of the latter...

You can pull the image for offline analysis at zardus/dc2020q-whooo-are-you

You can get the subflags at whooo-are-u-helper.challenges.ooo

Threshold starts at 9000 and reduces by 1 every 20 seconds.

`whooo-are-u.challenges.ooo 5000`

babymaze.description:
The flag is on the wings of the flying plane. It is possible to get the flag without instrumenting or modifying the binary. Tested on Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and Ubuntu 20.04. You should use a system able to run the game at approximately 60 fps. It requires: sudo apt-get install freeglut3

`babymaze.challenges.ooo 7777`

Files:
 * [BabyMaze](https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/oooverflow-challs/626c9621bbdac5aaf0552b9e25bc37db88bcd5f8d2f1d106004961192cd366f1/BabyMaze) 4d7aabfb62d46ea98379254a62023f178c1922c0908f3ff19634ca8c22f97cef

biooosless.description:
Q: can you read from a floppy?

A: LOL, yes, just mount it and read its content ...

Q: OK. But what if there is no OS?

A: ahah, ROFLT, yes, just invoke BIOS routines and read it ...

Q: OK. But if there is no BIOS?

A: F. M. L.

Hint: this is mostly a shellcoding challenge, not a reversing one.

Hint #2: the files in the bundle allow you to test everything locally -- no need to hammer the server. Please be nice!

`biooosless.challenges.ooo 6543`

Files:
 * [local-setup.tgz](https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/oooverflow-challs/e0881dd23a9581c9693c38010a521317c8404db0b84beac9ced9b7270f84c4b3/local-setup.tgz) 6a0364e9e4462365112ede26398098d5c6cc44837a37ece5ff8a04fb5b39e6b4

mamamaze.description:
Since you had a lot of fun with BabyMaze, we created a new version: MamaMaze! The flag is on the wings of the flying plane. It is possible to get the flag without instrumenting or modifying the binary. Tested on Ubuntu 16.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and Ubuntu 20.04. You should use a system able to run the game at approximately 60 fps. It requires: sudo apt-get install freeglut3

`mamamaze.challenges.ooo 7877`

find your flag in the treasure map -->  see fungez

Notice: sha256(flag) != 16763d780a05aaf57467e776be17d39f08ab5a62f6caaabe2656d01057b91540
check the updated map

Notice+: there is only one unexpected solution to the old map, sha256(wrong_flag_works_old_map_not_new_map) = e125fb41bc9c1f1d5c2a3a0477ed3ee843122873675c4e91dc8341324347c940, sha256(wrong_flag_works_on_no_map) = 16763d780a05aaf57467e776be17d39f08ab5a62f6caaabe2656d01057b91540

floood.description:
There is a tide in the affairs of men, which taken at the flood, leads on to
fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in
miseries. On such a full sea are we now afloat. And we must take the current
when it serves, or lose our ventures.


`floood.challenges.ooo control on 19696, tap on 19697`
